channel.title: CVE Feed for Ivanti -- CSA (Cloud Services Appliance)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ivanti -- CSA (Cloud Services Appliance)

item.title: CVE-2024-9380|2024-10-10T13:49:33.688Z -- ivanti -- csa%20%28cloud%20services%20appliance%29
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability in the admin web console of Ivanti CSA before version 5.0.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin privileges to obtain remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-9379|2024-10-10T13:48:45.310Z -- ivanti -- csa%20%28cloud%20services%20appliance%29
item.description: SQL injection in the admin web console of Ivanti CSA before version 5.0.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin privileges to run arbitrary SQL statements.

item.title: CVE-2024-9379|2024-10-09T13:03:34.408Z -- ivanti -- csa%20%28cloud%20services%20appliance%29
item.description: SQL injection in the admin web console of Ivanti CSA before version 5.0.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin privileges to run arbitrary SQL statements.

item.title: CVE-2024-9379|2024-10-08T18:09:34.112Z -- ivanti -- csa%20%28cloud%20services%20appliance%29
item.description: SQL injection in the admin web console of Ivanti CSA before version 5.0.2 allows a remote authenticated attacker with admin privileges to run arbitrary SQL statements.

item.title: CVE-2024-8963|2024-09-21T15:12:11.194Z -- ivanti -- csa%20%28cloud%20services%20appliance%29
item.description: Path Traversal in the Ivanti CSA before 4.6 Patch 519 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to access restricted functionality.

item.title: CVE-2024-8963|2024-09-19T17:14:49.386Z -- ivanti -- csa%20%28cloud%20services%20appliance%29
item.description: Path Traversal in the Ivanti CSA before 4.6 Patch 519 allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to access restricted functionality.

item.title: CVE-2024-8190|2024-09-14T03:55:55.448Z -- ivanti -- csa%20%28cloud%20services%20appliance%29
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability in Ivanti Cloud Services Appliance versions 4.6 Patch 518 and before allows a remote authenticated attacker to obtain remote code execution. The attacker must have admin level privileges to exploit this vulnerability.

item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability in Ivanti Cloud Services Appliance versions 4.6 Patch 518 and before allows a remote authenticated attacker to obtain remote code execution. The attacker must have admin level privileges to exploit this vulnerability.
